data: Heterogeneous Graph Learning based on Financial Report Conference Call Data
Dual-mechanism approach combining spatial relationships and stock dynamics
Dynamic relationship modeling realized through information entropy
Multi-relationship diffusion process with parallel retention
Sustained superior performance in NASDAQ, NYSE, and Shanghai markets (2016-2023)
Two-stage denoising framework with local perception attention
Accuracy: 59.1% Increased profit/loss ratio in volatile markets
Trainable sentiment aggregation optimized for prediction
Performance improvement of 3-7% across various tasks
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Superior performance in prediction and explanation quality
